lead_paragraph: An article on Tuesday about the election of the umpire Doug Harvey and the manager Whitey Herzog to the National Baseball Hall of Fame misstated the number of times that Marvin Miller, the onetime head of the players union, has been denied entrance. It is four, including twice in 2007; this was not the third time.
